article: Jimmy is an American boy. He's thirteen. He lives _  his family in China. There are  _  people in his family. His father David Clinton, his mother Catherine and his little sister Abbey. He has a yellow dog. _ name is Larry. Look! Abbey is  _ with Larry. His father is washing his car. His mother is cleaning the house. _  is Jimmy doing? Ah, he is doing  _ homework in Chinese.
